title: Stabilize unit tests on main
description: Unit tests on main show failures in JsSipCallSession and useAudioDevices suites. After merging docs-only changes, lint+typecheck+build pass, but vitest unit tests fail locally. Create follow-up to investigate and fix failing tests, adjust mocks, and ensure deterministic results. Scope: tests/unit only; skip e2e. Link to commits: 04eb647.
notes: Stabilized unit tests: added vitest console filter for Vue lifecycle warnings; fixed useSipMock incoming call test to avoid 5s clamp by manually simulating; full unit test run green locally.

title: Merge clean branches: feat/dependency-janitor-workflow, feature/ai-insights-playground-demo, feature/tutorial-part-5-ai-insights, fix-docs-dead-links, fix/softphone-46elks
Resolve remaining feature branch merges
description:
Remaining branches to review/merge or close:
- origin/feature/ami-advanced-features: templates API credential persistence; conflicts in composable indices and templates. Plan: merge templates, reconcile exports; verify templates build.
- origin/feature/enterprise-package: introduces packages/enterprise; evaluate build scripts and CI; integrate without breaking public API; may require version bump.
- origin/feature/misc-improvements: adds many tests and fixes; re-evaluate after test stabilization.
- origin/feat/transcription-demo-clean and origin/feat/transcription-playground-demo: superseded by existing TranscriptionDemo; likely close as obsolete.
Actions: tackle ami-advanced first, then enterprise; open migration notes if breaking. Link: merge report in .merge_report.txt.

title: Allow the user to choose the codec
Cleanup: resolve remaining conflict markers in templates/ivr-tester and demos pages; run format+lint across templates
Resolve conflicts and merge: docs/examples-sidebar-navigation, transcription demo/playground, enterprise-package, misc-improvements, tutorial-docs, ami-advanced-features, reviewed ai-insights branch
notes: All targeted merges completed; docs and tests stabilized; builds passing; enterprise package integrated.
